title: What is the HYPERADVANCED Quantum Psi Program held in Turin and what does it entail?
first_phrase: In this text, we dive into the last 200 tokens of a 4-day course on Quantum Psi/Hyperadvanced Program held in Torino. We start with an introduction to the techniques of "deconstruction," a way of working with emotions parallel to the dry (Yang) pathway taught in the course's presence program. The text then covers various concepts, including the tenets of Polyvagal theory, Polarities, and the Postural triad, the Spiegel Method, and Oculomotor Blockage, ending with a discussion on Trances people live and how they lose themselves.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the HYPERADVANCED Quantum Psi program, which took place over four days in Turin, aimed to introduce participants to the techniques of deconstruction that delineate a wet path (that works on emotion) to practice in parallel with the dry path (Yang) already taught in the presence course. Participants learned about polyvagal theory, polarities, and Trances people live, among other topics, and gained a better understanding of quantum techniques, such as the use of light and rotation of the head to work on the global level. The course provided a wealth of practical tools and insights for those interested in this field.
